channel.title: Forum broke?
channel.description:
Just tried making a new post in the runescape discussion board, told me I couldn't make a new thread. So I tried to do it via the reply button, instead of quick reply but I was told that my session timed out or something. Tried re-logging, now I can't log back in tells me I should enter a username but I am
[img]http://grab.by/2dTy[/img]
This is in chrome, this post is made from firefox.
EDIT: nevermind, re-opening chrome appears to have fixed it.

item.title: Forum broke?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

The moral of the story is that you shouldn’t use a bug ridden internet browser like chrometum.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum broke?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

This happened to me before, then I hit the Home button and it worked, no idea what happened.

Read full topic
